author: omgbrick
title: intresting
review:
I got this from my mom with all the other pens a long time ago so now onto the reveiw.

Pros:
- Pen works well 
- Easy too change the decorations for the pen .
- Looks good (come on It's Lego)
Cons:
Minifig looks odd as theres a hole right through it and its weak.
wheres his cross bow. 

conclusion
This is a good pen grea for a small gift.
